text:
Yeah, I’m trying to get in as soon as possible. I’ve had 5 interviews with ILM, DNEG, Framestore and Molinare. They said I should here from them in 2 weeks time. So, right now. I’m trying to work on some key skillset like coding and Modeling. 

Regarding, mentoring skype call are really helpful as it would help me get some feedback on topology and texturing. I’ve also have another mentor helping me out from ILM as well. So, I’ll let you know about my schedule and what kind of  availability you have. As I can imagine your busy as well! :blush:
Sounds like you don’t need too much help then!! Great news! What positions were they for? :)
I’ve applied for the Assistant Technical Director role for them all.
